name: Pixel Creator
description:
Pixel Creator was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, where the theme was Roll of the Dice. That means it has to be random. So I came up with the idea of having a sandbox game- that's random! It generates a random toolbox for you to get to the finish flag- and get the 10 points you need to finish the level! Oh and when you touch the finish flag, it teleports to a random position, so be careful about that!

TEXTURES (Saws, Grass, Jump Pads, etc.): THE PIXEL ADVENTURE 1 ASSETS 

UI TEXTURES MADE BY ME

SOUNDS MADE WITH BOSCA CEOIL, AND SFXR

Oh and there's something on the main menu... <-> 

;)
